text: @SouthernOracle4 There didn't seem to know my name was the only one that showed any signs of current use.

passages.source_name: Long Dark Teatime Of The Soul
passages.full_quote: <used>There didn't seem to</used> be any common theme or purpose behind the cuttings

passages.source_name: Long Dark Teatime Of The Soul
passages.full_quote: The only person I met who <used>didn't seem to know my name was the only one</used> I actually introduced myself to

passages.full_quote: The larger of the two bedrooms <used>was the only one that showed any signs of current use</used>
